Verses: 1 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarum, Avanudaiya Sarvasenaiyum, Avan Aalugaikkutpatta Boomiyin Sagala Raajyangalum, Sagala Janangalum Erusalemukkum Adhai Serndha Sagala Pattanangalukkum Virodhamaaga Yuththampannugaiyil Eremiyaavukkuk Karththaraal Undaana Vaarththai:

2 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal: Nee Poi, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaavinidaththil Pesi, Avanukku Sollavendiyadhu: Idho, Naan Indha Nagaraththai Baabilon Raajaavin Kaiyil Oppukkodukkiren; Avan Idhai Akkiniyaal Sutterippaan.

3 nee Avan Kaikkuth Thappippogaamal, Nichchayamaaip Pidipattu, Avan Kaiyil Oppukkodukkappaduvaai; Un Kangal Baabilon Raajaavin Kangalaik Kaanum; Avan Vaai Un Vaayode Pesum; Nee Baabilonukkup Povaai Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
4 aagilum Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaave, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kel; Unnaik Kuriththuk Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Nee Pattayaththaale Saavadhillai.

5 samaadhaanaththode Saavaai; Unakku Munnirundha Raajaakkalaagiya Un Pidhaakkalinimiththam Kandhavarkkangalaik Koluththinadhupola Unnimiththamum Koluththi, Aiyo! Aandavane, Endru Solli, Unakkaagap Pulambuvaargal; Idhu Naan Sonna Vaarththaiyendru Karththar Uraiththaar Endru Sol Endraar.
6 indha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Eremiyaa Erusalemile Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaavinidaththil Sonnaan.

7 appozhudhu Baabilon Raajaavin Senaigal Erusalemukku Virodhamaagavum Meendha Pattanangalaagiya Laageesukkum, Asekkaavukkum Virodhamaagavum Yuththampannikkondirundhadhu; Yoodhaavin Aranippaana Pattanangalil Ivaigale Meendhirundhavaigal.

8 oruvanum Yoodhajaadhiyaanaagiya Than Sagodharanai Adimaikollaadhapadikku, Avanavan Ebireyanaagiya Than Velaikkaaranaiyum, Ebireya Sthreeyaagiya Than Velaikkaariyaiyum Suyaadheenaraaga Anuppividavendumendru Avargalukku Vidudhalaiyaik Koorumpadi,
9 raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaa Erusalemil Irukkira Ellaa Janaththodum Udanpadikkai Panninapinbu, Eremiyaavukkuk Karththaraal Vaarththai Undaayitru.

10 ovvoruvanum Than Velaikkaaranaiyum Than Velaikkaariyaiyum Ini Adimai Kollaadhapadikku, Suyaadheenaraaga Anuppividavendumendru Udanpadikkaikku Utpatta Ellaap Prabukkalum Ellaa Janangalum Kettapodhu, Sevikoduththu Avargalai Anuppivittaargal.

11 aanaalum Adharkuppinbu Avargal Maaraattampanni, Thaangal Suyaadheenaraaga Anuppivitta Velaikkaararaiyum Velaikkaarigalaiyum Marupadiyum Azhaippiththu, Avargalai Velaikkaararum Velaikkaarigalumaayirukkumpadi, Adimaippaduththikkondaargal.
12 aadhalaal, Karththaraale Eremiyaavukku Vaarththaiyundaagi, Avar:

13 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Avanavan Thanakku Virkappatta Ebireyanaagiya Than Sagodharanai Mudivile Neengal Ezhaam Varushaththile Anuppividavendum Endrum, Avan Unakku Aaruvarusham Adimaiyaayirundhapinbu, Avanai Unnidaththil Vaikkaamal Suyaadheenanaaga Anuppividavendum Endrum,

14 naan Ungal Pidhaakkalai Adimai Veedaagiya Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Naalile Avargalode Udanpadikkaipanninen; Aanaalum Ungal Pidhaakkal En Sollaik Kelaamalum, Thangal Seviyai Saayaamalum Ponaargal.

15 neengalo, Innaalile Mananthirumbi, Avanavan Than Ayalaanukku Vidudhalaiyaik Koorina Vishayaththile En Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Seydhu, En Naamam Tharikkappatta Aalayaththile Idharkaaga En Mugaththukkumun Udanpadikkaipanniyirundheergal.

16 aanaalum Neengal Maaraattampanni, En Naamaththaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakki, Neengal Avanavan Vidudhalaiyaagavum Suyaadheenanaagavum Anuppivitta Than Velaikkaaranaiyum Velaikkaariyaiyum Thirumba Azhaiththu Vandhu, Avargalai Ungalukku Velaikkaararum Velaikkaarigalumaayirukkumpadi Adimaippaduththineergal.

17 aagaiyaal Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Neengal Avanavan Than Sagodharanukkum Avanavan Than Ayalaanukkum Vidudhalaiyaik Koorinavishayaththil En Sollaik Kelaamarponeergale; Idho Naan Ungalaip Pattayaththukkum, Kollainoikkum, Panjaththukkum Oppukkodukkira Vidudhalaiyai Ungalukkuk Koorugiren; Boomiyin Raajyangalilellaam Alaigiradharkum Ungalai Oppukkoduppen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

18 en Mugaththukkumun Pannina Udanpadikkaiyin Vaarththaigalai Niraivetraamal, En Udanpadikkaiyai Meerina Manusharai Naan Thundangalin Naduvaagak Kadandhupogumpadi Avargalai Irandaagath Thundiththa Kandrukkuttiyaippol Aakkuven.
19 kandrukkuttiyin Thundugalin Naduve Kadandhupona Yoodhaavin Prabukkalaiyum, Erusalemin Prabukkalaiyum, Pradhaanigalaiyum, Aasaariyargalaiyum, Dhesaththin Sagala Janangalaiyum Appadi Seydhu,

20 naan Avargalai Avargal Saththurukkalin Kaiyilum, Avargal Praananai Vaangaththedugiravargalin Kaiyilum Oppukkoduppen; Avargaludaiya Predham Aagaayaththin Paravaigalukkum Boomiyin Mirugangalukkum Iraiyaagum.

21 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaavaiyum Avanudaiya Prabukkalaiyum Avargal Saththurukkalin Kaiyilum Avargal Praananai Vaangath Thedugiravargalin Kaiyilum, Ungalai Vittup Perndhupona Baabilon Raajaavinudaiya Senaigalin Kaiyilum Oppukkoduppen.

22 idho, Naan Kattalaikoduththu, Avargalai Indha Nagaraththukkuth Thirumbappannuven; Avargal Adharku Virodhamaaga Yuththampanni, Adhaip Pidiththu, Adhai Akkiniyaal Sutterippaargal; Yoodhaavin Pattanangalaiyum, Oruvarum Avaigalil Kudiyiraadhapadip Paazhaaippogappannuven Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
